resources.string: [es]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[es]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[es]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[es]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.

[es]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.
[es]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[es]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[es]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[es]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[es]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[es]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[es]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[es]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[es]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[es]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor & improve your proposition.
[es]The Security & Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[es]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[es]The CDP2 platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.
Página de inicio de la aplicación móvil
[es]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics

Permito a Philips recoger mis datos sobre las aplicaciones para ayudar al funcionamiento, mejora y personalización de la aplicación, para la integración con las redes sociales y para mostrar contenido relevante y publicidad.

Aviso sobre cookies

Esta aplicación utiliza Adobe Analytics, un servicio de analítica ("Adobe Analytics") proporcionado por Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited ("Adobe"). Adobe Analytics utiliza "cookies" o técnicas similares, que son archivos de texto ubicados en la aplicación, con el fin de ayudar a la aplicación a analizar los patrones del tráfico generales a través de nuestra aplicación. Al transmitir la información generada por la cookie sobre el uso de la aplicación a Adobe, el ajuste garantiza que la dirección IP es anónima antes la ubicación geográfica y que se sustituirá por una dirección IP genérica antes del almacenamiento. En nombre de Philips, Adobe utilizará esta información para la evaluación de su uso de la aplicación, recopilar informes sobre la actividad de la aplicación para Philips y con el fin de proporcionar otros servicios relacionados con actividad de la aplicación y el uso de la aplicación para Philips. Adobe no asociará su dirección IP con ningún otro dato que conserve Adobe. Puede evitar la recopilación y uso de datos de Adobe y Philips (cookies y la dirección IP) si anula cuando cierre esta pantalla.
[es]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

Tras haber mostrado su consentimiento, es posible que algunas empresas del grupo Philips se pongan en contacto con usted con motivo de comunicaciones promocionales por correo electrónico, SMS y otros canales digitales, como aplicaciones móviles y redes sociales. Para poder personalizar las comunicaciones en función de sus preferencias y acciones, y así proporcionarte la mejor experiencia personalizada, podríamos analizar y combinar sus datos personales. Dichos datos podrían incluir: 

Los datos facilitados por usted
Los datos que desee compartir activamente con nosotros, como su nombre, fecha de nacimiento o edad, dirección de correo electrónico, dirección postal, país, sexo, número de teléfono o perfil en redes sociales.

Los datos que obtenemos de sus interacciones con Philips
Los datos sobre sus interacciones y uso de los canales digitales de Philips, como redes sociales, sitios web, correo electrónico, aplicaciones y productos conectados. Estos datos podrían incluir: direcciones IP, cookies, información del dispositivo, comunicaciones en las que haga clic, detalles de ubicación y sitios web que visita

Philips le permitirá retirar su consentimiento en cualquier momento.
Para obtener más información, lea el Aviso de privacidad de Philips y el Aviso sobre las cookies de Philips.
[es]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[es]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[es]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[es]Configuration can only be changed at launch time. You need to relaunch the app to change it.
[es]I want to share my app data to help improve the app and provide me with personalized services

[es]Adobe Analytics\\n\\nThis App uses Adobe Analytics, an analytics service (\\\"Adobe Analytics”) provided by Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (\\\"Adobe\\\") Adobe Analytics uses \\\"cookies\\\" or similar techniques, which are text files placed in your App, in order to help the App to analyze overall traffic patterns through our App. By transmitting the information generated by the cookie about the use of the App to Adobe, setting ensures that IP address is anonymized before geo-localization und will be replaced by a generic IP address before storage. On behalf of Philips, Adobe will use this information for the evaluation of your use of the App, compiling reports on App activity for Philips, and in order to provide other services relating to App activity and use of the App to IP address with any other data held Philips Adobe will not associate your by Adobe. You can prevent Adobe\\\'s and Philips collection and use of data out after you close this screen (cookies and IP address) if you opt-out after you close this screen.\\n\\nGoogle Firebase\\n\\nThis App uses Google Firebase, an app development service (Firebase) provided by Google Ireland Ltd (\\\"Google\\\"). Firebase uses cookies or similar techniques- SDK, which are text files placed in your App and web browser.\\n\\nOn behalf of Philips, Firebase will use information from your device such as your Device ID. IP address, your IDFA or Google Play Services ID and your MAC address and replace them with unique code. When you use the App we will measure the numbers of visits to the App, which pages you visit your network connection, load times and when the app crashes. We use this information to evaluate and understand your use of the App, to test and analyze performance and ultimately optimize our products and services.
